title: Hipolitów, Poddębice County
text:
Hipolitów is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Uniej%C3%B3w">Gmina Uniejów</a>, within <a href="Podd%C4%99bice%20County">Poddębice County</a>, <a href="%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA%20Voivodeship">Łódź Voivodeship</a>, in central Poland. It lies approximately north-east of <a href="Uniej%C3%B3w">Uniejów</a>, north-west of <a href="Podd%C4%99bice">Poddębice</a>, and north-west of the regional capital <a href="%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA">Łódź</a>.
The village has a population of 70.
